Pre-Game Insights: Iceland competes within Group 4 of the B league of the Nations League, alongside Montenegro, Turkey, and Wales.
Captain Jóhann Berg Guðmundsson believes the team is on a good path and hopes to show it in the match.
Montenegro’s brightest star is captain Stevan Jovetic, who is currently without a club.
Several key players are injured, including Hákon Arnar Haraldsson, Sverrir Ingi Ingason, and Brynjar Ingi Bjarnason.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will kick off at 6:45 PM at Laugardalsvöllur stadium in Reykjavík.
Tickets can be purchased on tix.is.
The Icelandic team aims to entertain the fans and secure a good result.
